data.what_is:
PushAlert is a multi-channel customer engagement platform which supports web push notifications, app notifications for Android and iOS along with on-site messaging. Enabled with class-leading architecture, PushAlert helps businesses engage with their audience by sending real-time notifications about updates, promotions, news, and also engage with customers who are currently onsite.

PushAlert provides seamless personalization and deep analytics integrations, broad compatibility with web and app platforms along with an open API to help businesses of all sizes create meaningful customer journeys.

Want to learn more about PushAlert? Please reach out to us at support@pushalert.co

initial_reviews.review_title: Unmatched user engagement and a brilliant support team.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PushAlert?
As a digital marketer striving for maximum user engagement, I cannot express enough gratitude for stumbling upon PushAlert. This platform has single-handedly transformed the way I interact with my audience, delivering unparalleled results with its seamless service, unwavering support, and effortless usability.

What do you dislike about PushAlert?
Haven't seen anything I dislike yet. The platform is very easy to use even for notice users.

What problems is PushAlert solving and how is that benefiting you?
From the moment I integrated PushAlert into my website, I witnessed a significant surge in user engagement. The ability to reach my audience directly on their desktop and mobile devices with targeted, personalized notifications has been a game-changer. It's like having a direct line to each user, ensuring that my messages are not lost in the noise of email inboxes or social media feeds.

One of the standout features of PushAlert is its intuitive interface. Navigating through the platform is a breeze, even for someone like me who isn't a tech guru. Setting up campaigns, creating custom segments, and scheduling notifications can all be done with just a few clicks, saving me valuable time and effort.

But what truly sets PushAlert apart is its exceptional customer support. Whenever I've encountered an issue or had a question about maximizing the platform's potential, the support team has been there every step of the way, providing prompt and insightful assistance. Their dedication to ensuring the success of their customers is truly commendable and has instilled in me a sense of confidence and trust in the platform.

Furthermore, PushAlert's robust analytics dashboard has provided me with invaluable insights into the performance of my campaigns.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about PushAlert?
Sometimes words does not justify a story like this.....
It was the beginning of the lockdown in South Africa, our government decided to shutdown e-commerce as well, this meant I had no income as my website is my only form of income. I had to reach out to PushAlert as it is a monthly commitment. I knew I would not be able to pay them and my biggest fear was that they would destroy my database of clients. They replied via an email to assure me that I had nothing to worry about.

I could not believe this, even getting tears in my eyes as I am typing this.......

E-commerce was opened yesterday the 14th of May 2020 in South Africa, as usual I had the best day ever. I contacted Alex to ask him to add my bill from last month and they said no.

People, this is not just a software company THEY ARE REAL PEOPLE!!!!!!!

Thank you team PushAlert!!!!  You guys have given the word humanity a new meaning!

I currently use the product and I love it. As my business grow I will also grow with PushAlert!

Your Client for Life!

Le Roux Fourie
South Africa

What do you dislike about PushAlert?
I can honestly say that there is nothing to dislike.

What problems is PushAlert solving and how is that benefiting you?
Immediate notifications is great to communicate new products or launches through to your clients.
